attributes.action: Urge Parliament to block the unfunded spending plans of the Government.
attributes.additional_details: The Government has chosen to rush through a series of measures which clearly favour a very small, wealthy section of the population whilst ignoring the very real financial problems being faced by the overwhelming majority, this without any serious scrutiny by the Office for Budget Responsibility. The only certainty is that the cost of these handouts to the wealthy will be born by future generations of ordinary taxpayers.
attributes.background: To halt the implementation of the measures announced and require the Government to publish a detailed analysis of the burden of debt being imposed on future generations, a burden being imposed without any serious scrutiny of the cost of the proposals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Reverse the tax cuts announced in the mini budget
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623929

Scrap the mini-budget and ensure independent review of any replacement package
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684
